amendment.description: To provide for a payment of $11,750 to the Harriet Tubman Home in Auburn, New York.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1726 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1726 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S11813-11814; text: CR S11814) To provide for a payment of $11,750 to the Harriet Tubman Home in Auburn, New York.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1726 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1726 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Clinton.
